about_the_game:
Let yourself into the Old West without human... but drunk vegetables! Playing as a Mexican jumping bean you will find yourself in a pretty unusual setting for such a creature. Would you be able to conquer all these drunk and hostile vegetables and make yourself a new Sheriff of the town? Don't let yourself crack though, because the worm inside you is too fragile to fight.

Gameplay

BEANDEJO is an action-packed roguelite top down shooter stuffed with spaghetti western elements and veggie brutality. Each move must be quick and precise, and you are left to choreograph your way through different saloon rooms, being constantly outnumbered by various wicked bandits. It's hard to aim being drunk all the time, so you need to always spin your weapon clockwise or anti-clockwise, making your life even more troublesome.

Key Features

  • Hardcore and challenging gameplay loop

  • Unique control scheme

  • Dozens of hand-crafted saloon rooms

  • Authentic weapons from the Old West

  • Goofy and remarkable visuals

content_descriptors.notes: Cartoon gore and insinuated consumption of alcohol by the main character.

short_description: Action-packed cartoony roguelite situated in the town of Cactusdale. Play as a Mexican jumping bean, who can’t move and aim properly. Jump your way through different saloons to encounter goons and spin your revolver to become the Sheriff of the town.
